senses.sense_definition: A style of corrupt politics characterized by boss control, patronage, and bribery, historically associated with the Tammany Hall organization in New York City.

examples.text: The opposition leader leveled charges of <w>tammanyism</w> against the ruling party for their alleged vote-buying schemes.
Scholars analyze <w>tammanyism</w> as a prime example of how patronage systems can dominate municipal government.
